articles.title: What Happened With Apple Stock Today?
articles.content: Apple is exploring AI technologies from Anthropic and OpenAI to enhance Siri's capabilities, with potential integration into their cloud infrastructure for testing in the upcoming year.

articles.title: Robinhood’s 300% Rally: Expansion or Exuberance Driving the Surge?
articles.content: Robinhood announced expansion into European markets with stock and ETF tokens, crypto staking, and a new credit card, driving its stock price up over 300% in the past year.

articles.title: Apple: The Mag 7’s Dead Money Stock or AI Cash Cow in the Making?
articles.content: Apple is experiencing challenges with flat product revenue and underwhelming AI efforts, but has potential for growth through AI innovation and its massive device ecosystem.

articles.title: BitGo and Dinari Launch Unified API for Crypto, Stablecoins, and Tokenized U.S. Equities
articles.content: BitGo and Dinari announced a strategic partnership enabling developers to offer tokenized equities, crypto, and stablecoins through a single integrated platform with unified compliance and custody.

articles.title: S&P 500: Key Weekly Levels and Price Targets
articles.content: An analysis of S&P 500 futures, highlighting technical developments and potential trading zones for the upcoming week, focusing on strategic price targets and market movements.

articles.title: S&P 500: Is the Market Gearing Up for a Summer Rally?
articles.content: The S&P 500 has surpassed record highs in 2025, with UBS Global Wealth Management raising its year-end target to 6,200. Driven by easing trade tensions, optimistic earnings forecasts, and potential trade deals, the market shows bullish momentum with technical indicators supporting a potential summer rally.

articles.title: Apple in the AI race: Could an external AI model power Siri?
articles.content: Apple (AAPL) is reportedly considering external artificial intelligence (AI) models like Anthropic (ANTH.PVT) or OpenAI (OPAI.PVT) to power Siri, according to Bloomberg reporting. TechRadar editor at large Lance Ulanoff joins Asking for a Trend with Josh Lipton to discuss what the report signals about Apple's place in the AI race and the iPhone maker's unique position as an AI laggard with a massive user base. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend here.

articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow Jones Looks To Extend Win Streak; Solar Stocks Shine After Change To Trump Bill (Live Coverage)
articles.content: The Dow Jones climbed more than 430 points. The Senate passed President Donald Trump's amended megabill on Tuesday.

articles.title: Why Robinhood Stock Is Soaring: A Buying Opportunity?
articles.content: HOOD jumps 12.8% after unveiling crypto futures, staking, and tokenized U.S. stocks for EU and U.S. users.
